SELECT K.* FROM ( SELECT A.EntCode AS "EntCode" ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, D.MultiDisplayName) AS "EntName" , A.JobFunctionCode AS "JobFunctionCode" , A.JobFunctionID AS "JobFunctionID" , A.JobFunctionName AS "JobFunctionName" , A.JobFunctionType AS "JobFunctionType" ,(SELECT CodeName FROM sys_base_code WHERE Code = A.JobFunctionType AND CodeGroup = 'JobFunctionType') AS "JobFunctionTypeName" , A.Description AS "Description" , A.SortKey AS "SortKey" , TO_CHAR(A.InsertDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss') AS "InsertDate" , A.IsUse AS "IsUse" FROM jwf_jobfunction A LEFT JOIN sys_object_domain D ON D.DomainCode = A.EntCode
LEFT JOIN jwf_jobfunctionmember jj ON A.JobFunctionID = jj.JobFunctionID LEFT JOIN sys_object_user sou ON jj.UserCode = sou.UserCode
AND JobFunctionType = #{JobFunctionType}
AND D.DomainId = #{EntCode}
AND D.DomainId IN
#{item}
AND
A.JobFunctionName A.JobFunctionCode sou.DisplayName jj.UserCode
like '%' || #{SearchText} || '%'
AND ( A.JobFunctionName LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR A.JobFunctionCode LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR sou.DisplayName LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR jj.UserCode LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' )
GROUP BY A.EntCode, A.JobFunctionID, A.JobFunctionCode, D.MultiDisplayName, A.JobFunctionName, A.JobFunctionType ,A.Description ,A.SortKey,A.InsertDate,A.IsUse ) K
"IsUse" "JobFunctionName" "JobFunctionCode" "JobFunctionTypeName" "Description" "InsertDate" EntName "SortKey"
ASC DESC
"SortKey" ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.JobFunctionID FROM jwf_jobfunction A LEFT JOIN sys_object_domain D ON D.DomainCode = A.EntCode
LEFT JOIN jwf_jobfunctionmember jj ON A.JobFunctionID = jj.JobFunctionID LEFT JOIN sys_object_user sou ON jj.UserCode = sou.UserCode
AND A.JobFunctionType = #{JobFunctionType}
AND D.DomainId = #{EntCode}
AND D.DomainId IN
#{item}
AND
A.JobFunctionName A.JobFunctionCode sou.DisplayName jj.UserCode
like '%' || #{SearchText} || '%'
AND ( A.JobFunctionName LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR A.JobFunctionCode LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR sou.DisplayName LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' OR jj.UserCode LIKE '%'||#{icoSearch}||'%' )
GROUP BY A.JobFunctionID ) A

SELECT M.JobFunctionMemberID AS "JobFunctionMemberID" , M.JobFunctionID AS "JobFunctionID" , M.UserCode AS "UserCode" , M.SortKey AS "SortKey" , M.Weight AS "Weight" , P.UserID AS "UR_ID" , P.DisplayName AS "UR_Name" , BG.DeptName AS "DEPT_NAME" , BG.DeptName AS "DEPT_CODE" , DN.DisplayName AS "DN_Name" FROM jwf_jobfunctionmember M INNER JOIN sys_object_user P ON M.UserCode =P.UserCode INNER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup BG ON P.UserCode = BG.UserCode AND BG.JobType ='Origin' INNER JOIN sys_object_domain DN ON BG.CompanyCode = DN.DomainCode WHERE M.JobFunctionID = #{JobFunctionID}
AND BG.DeptName LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND
BG.DeptName P.DisplayName M.UserCode
LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
P.DisplayName M.UserCode BG.DeptName M.SortKey
ASC DESC
M.SortKey ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jwf_jobfunctionmember M INNER JOIN sys_object_user P ON M.UserCode =P.UserCode INNER JOIN sys_object_user_basegroup BG ON P.UserCode = BG.UserCode AND BG.JobType ='Origin' INNER JOIN sys_object_domain DN ON BG.CompanyCode = DN.DomainCode WHERE M.JobFunctionID = #{JobFunctionID}
AND BG.DeptName LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'
AND
BG.DeptName P.DisplayName M.UserCode
LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

SELECT EntCode AS "EntCode" , JobFunctionCode AS "JobFunctionCode" , JobFunctionID AS "JobFunctionID" , JobFunctionName AS "JobFunctionName" , JobFunctionType AS "JobFunctionType" , Description AS "Description" , SortKey AS "SortKey" , TO_CHAR(InsertDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "InsertDate" , IsUse AS "IsUse" FROM jwf_jobfunction WHERE JobFunctionID = #{JobFunctionID}

SELECT M.JobFunctionMemberID AS "JobFunctionMemberID" , M.JobFunctionID AS "JobFunctionID" , M.UserCode AS "UserCode" , M.SortKey AS "SortKey" , M.Weight AS "Weight" , P.DisplayName AS "UR_Name" , BG.DeptName AS "DEPT_NAME" -- 부서이름 , BG.DeptName AS "DEPT_CODE" FROM jwf_jobfunctionmember M left join sys_object_user P ON M.UserCode =P.UserCode left join sys_object_user_basegroup BG ON P.UserCode = BG.UserCode AND BG.JobType ='Origin' WHERE JobFunctionMemberID = #{JobFunctionMemberID}
